function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Significant upheavals in residents' daily lives and mood due to the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased stress, distraction, anxiety, etc.","Mitigation":"Promoting mental health support and community resilience","Technologies":"Mental health apps, telemedicine, community support platforms","People":"Residents, communities, mental health professionals","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Emergence of the 'new norm' under the threat of COVID-19","Impact":"Shift in lifestyle and public behavior","Mitigation":"Public health education, behavior change interventions","Technologies":"Informational campaigns, behavior change apps","People":"General public, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Need for changes in urban and green planning after the pandemic","Impact":"Improved public health, inclusivity, and city resilience","Mitigation":"Implementing inclusive urban planning, adopting green infrastructure","Technologies":"Urban planning software, green building technologies","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, city residents","Owner":"City governments, urban planning authorities"}]}
